name: Chimera Warfare
description:
Fight as a seawater bacteria. Survival is key in this bacteria eat bacteria world. Defeat other bacteria  to grow and get stronger. Good luck!

Chimera wars was created for the 2021 Jamfuzer Gam jam.  Thank you Jamfuzer for giving us the opportunity to take part. 

TeamTrident  team:

Game Design - Jay Zhen

AI Programming - Gabriel Alabi

Gameplay Programming - Jay Zhen, Gabriel Alabi, David Brittain

UI Design - David Brittain

2D Art -  Jay Zhen, David Brittain

VFX and Shadergraph - David Brittain

Music - David Brittain

Controls:

Left click - Move the Player and attack
